message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $200 is way out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product but I can only offer $80 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest but $80 is just too low for me. How about we meet in the middle somewhere? Would you be willing to pay $140?
Alice, I'm still only able to pay $80.  I understand you want more, but that's my absolute maximum.  If you're not willing to go that low, I'm going to have to look at other options.
